    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the connection in a clean way on both sides when finished, clean up on both sides and remove all traces of it ever existing
      void emit(Packet p)
      Emit or write a packet this checks the connection type IF WEBSOCKET: try to serialize it and send it IF FIRE-IO: handle it in the IoManager (acts as the protocol implementation)
      IoManager getIoManager()
      Get the current active IoHandler
      void onClose()
      Close handler this checks the state in which the connection is closed and handles it appropriately this is where gets decided if the connection got CLOSED or that it DIED
      void onMessage(java.util.function.Consumer<EventPayload> listener)
      Register the on-message handler, used for internal cross overs
      void onOpen()
      On open handler reset the expectedClosing state
      void onPacket(Packet packet)
      FIRST low level Packet handler The first thing that happens when a packet is received, this handles internal packets and triggers the API
      void onWebSocketPacket(WebSocketTransaction webSocketTransaction)
      Java implementation of the WebSocket handshake over the HTTP protocol (connection upgrade)
